response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $15,000. Considering the significant benefits it offers, I am extending a special offer to you to acquire this product at a price of $18,000. This opportunity allows you to secure an item that could potentially be a game-changer in your endeavors. I look forward to hearing your response soon. Thank you for considering our product.", "product_price": 18000}
